moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Tailwind
moves.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Torment
moves.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

moves.name: Quash
moves.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.
